   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to kalabash-rspamd's documentation!
============================================

.. image:: _static/kalabash_logo.png
   :align: center

This `Kalabash <https://alphamonak.com/>`_ extension provides a simple
management frontend for `Rspamd <http://rspamd.com/>`_, a complete
mail tools capable of antivirus, dkim signing, dmarch checking and more...

Features currently supported are:

* Interfacing kalabash and rpsamd for dkim keys management

Contents:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   setup
